# Aanandham - Luxury Camping & Resorts in Munnar

## About
Aanandham is a premier booking platform for verified luxury tent stays, glamping experiences, and trekking adventures in Munnar, specifically Suryanelli and Kolukkumalai.

## Key Offerings
- Luxury Glamping Tents in Suryanelli
- Kolukkumalai Sunrise Trekking (Highest Tea Plantation)
- Off-road Jeep Safaris
- Sustainable Eco-stays
- Group & Corporate Events

## Location
Suryanelli Estate, Munnar, Kerala, India (Western Ghats)

## Website
https://aanandham.in
